title: Tool Trust Meta (v1)
description: Low-noise trust and retrieval signals intended for agents. Fields are best-effort and may be omitted.

retrieval_mode.description: Retrieval strategy used to produce the result.

fallback_used.description: Whether the tool used a fallback strategy (e.g. filesystem grep) to satisfy trust or freshness guardrails.

anchor_policy.description: Effective anchor policy applied by the tool (after environment/request overrides).

anchor_detected.description: Whether a strong anchor was detected in the query (quoted/path/identifier).

anchor_kind.description: Kind of the primary anchor used for guardrails (when detected).

anchor_primary.description: Primary normalized anchor value used for the anchor guarantee (when detected).

anchor_hits.description: How many returned snippets/items mention the primary anchor (best-effort).

anchor_not_found.description: When true, the tool detected an anchor but could not find any grounded snippet for it under the current constraints.
